ns0:DescribedValueSet.ns0:Purpose: (Clinical Focus: The focus of this set of values is to ensure that the procedure of chemotherapy has been started or completed.),(Data Element Scope: Using the Quality Data Model, this data element would map to the Intervention category.),(Inclusion Criteria: All persons with cancer receiving active treatment with chemotherapeutic agents.),(Exclusion Criteria: Persons with cancer, receiving active treatment with interventions other than chemotherapy.)
